title: AI Voice Recognizer
desc: Feature-rich social network built with MERN stack, including live messaging, dynamic profiles, and an admin dashboard.

title: Social Media Platform
desc: A fully featured Social Media Platform with Unique Connectivity, Chat, Admin Panel, Edit Profile and many more.

title: Blog Page
desc: An animated Blog Page with filtering blogs based on tags and time period.

title: Software License Page
desc: SoftSell is a modern marketplace UI for buying and selling unused software licenses.

title: WSI Viewer
desc: React-based Whole Slide Image Viewer with zoom, pan, bounding boxes, and mini-map.

title: Search Engine
desc: SearchXM is a responsive search engine providing web, image, and news results.

title: Service Page
desc: Mecode is a service-based website with multi-page routing.
